title: Japan stocks rebound as much as 10% after historic losses; other Asia markets also recover
content: The rebound follows a sharp sell-off in the U.S. with the Dow and the S&P 500 notching their worst sessions since September 2022.

title: $1 trillion wipeout: Market rout punishes megacap tech

title: San Francisco Fed President Daly sees interest rate cuts coming as labor market weakens
content: Progress on inflation and a clear slowdown in hiring likely will drive the Fed to some extent of policy easing, Daly said Monday.
summary: Progress on inflation and a clear slowdown in hiring likely will drive the Fed to some extent of policy easing, Daly said Monday.

title: OpenAI co-founder John Schulman says he will leave and join rival Anthropic

title: Investors are unwinding the biggest ‘carry trade’ the world has ever seen, SocGen strategist says
content: Carry trades refer to trades wherein an investor borrows in a currency with low interest rates and reinvests the proceeds in higher-yielding assets elsewhere.
summary: Carry trades refer to trades wherein an investor borrows in a currency with low interest rates and reinvests the proceeds in higher-yielding assets elsewhere.

title: Taiwan under pressure to bolster its defense as Trump-Harris presidential race stokes policy concerns
content: Experts say that Taiwan is under more pressure to build up its defense capabilities and deterrence in the face of uncertainty in the upcoming U.S. elections.

title: 'Never quit your job,' says early retiree and self-made multimillionaire: Do this instead
